name: raycast-scp-extension
title: SCP File Transfer
description: Transfer files between local and remote servers using SCP with SSH config integration
author: dytsou

commands.name: upload
commands.title: Upload Files Via SCP
commands.description: Upload local files to a remote server using SCP

commands.name: download
commands.title: Download Files Via SCP
commands.description: Download files from a remote server using SCP
